translations: v.取代；（用……）替换，（以……）接替；更换， 赔还；把......放回原处

sentences.sentence: Have they found anyone to replace her yet?
sentences.translation: 他们找到了代替她的人没有？

sentences.sentence: He headed off efforts to replace him as leader.
sentences.translation: 他挫败了要取代他的领导地位的企图。

sentences.sentence: New laws will soon replace existing legislation.
sentences.translation: 新法律即将取代现行法规。
